metadata.title: CVE-2021-42252 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in aspeed_lpc_ctrl_mmap indrivers/soc/aspeed/aspeed-lpc-ctrl.c in the Linux kernel before 5.14.6.Local attackers able to access the Aspeed LPC control interface couldoverwrite memory in the kernel and potentially execute privileges, akaCID-b49a0e69a7b1. This occurs because a certain comparison uses values thatare not memory sizes.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
